header.title: US Open SEXISM ROW: Alize Cornet PUNISHED for taking top off during match
header.subtitle: THE US OPEN was engulfed in controversy yesterday after an official penalised Alize Cornet for changing her shirt at the back of the court.
header.postText: 'Due to the soaring heat at Flushing Meadows this week, players in both the men and women’s side of the draw have been afforded a 10-minute break to rehydrate and cool off from the scorching weather.', 'But there was accusations of double standards yesterday when Cornet was hit with a code violation during her match against Swede Johanna Larsson.', 'Upon returning to the court after the break, Cornet realised she had put on her shirt backwards.', 'She retreated to the back of the court to quickly remove her top and turn it the right way round.', 'But as the Frenchwoman returned to the baseline, Danish umpire Christian Rask penalised her for unsportsmanlike behaviour.', 'The WTA rules state that a player can only change clothes during the end of a set, or during a medical timeout, in an off-court location.', 'Cornet appeared stunned by the ruling and she wasn’t the only one, with Judy Murray, Andy Murray's mother, one of many people attacking the decision.', 'Alize Cornet came back to court after 10 minute heat break, she tweeted.', 'Had her fresh shirt on back to front.Changed at back of court.Got a code violation.Unsportsmanlike conduct…..But the men can change shirts on court.', 'Many male players are seen changing their tops to reveal their torsos in full view of the crowd without receiving such punishment.', 'Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer were both pictured with their tops off during a 10 - minute break intheir respective matches yesterday.', 'Cornet ended up losing the match against Larsson 6 - 4, 3 - 6, 2 - 6 with temperatures reaching close to 36 C.', 'Several fans in attendance at Flushing Meadows required medical treatment due to the heat.', 'Cornet or the WTA are yet to comment on the incident.'
